ModMetaData.name: Kenney's Addons - Reduced Meal Costs
ModMetaData.author: kenney84
ModMetaData.description:
!!! UPDATED FOR 1.4 !!! THIS MOD WILL BE INCOMPATIBLE WITH ANY MOD THAT ALTERS MEAL OR FOOD COST.
Meals and food will cost less. Details can be found on the workshop page. If you are interested in the core mod, which applies some QoL changes to power consumption and flammability, you can find it here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1452835233
